data.title: Amish Market
data.text: The food is excellent. The several different types of soups and sandwiches are wonderful. The service and friendliness are great.

data.title: So good
data.text: Saw the Amish Kithceh while sight seeing with family. This is a store deli combo. Had olive loaf sandwich on whole made bread. Cup of vegetable beef soup and lemon meringue pie. It was the best meal of our whole trip. The price was good too. Can't wait to go back.

data.title: Downtown near the trail
data.text: I was riding my bike from Rogers south on the Razorback Greenway and started looking for a place for a light lunch. This place is a store in front and a comfy deli in the back much like a lot of old country stores. All the cold cuts and cheese are displayed. They also have beer. I had a half a ham and Swiss sandwich and a cup of exceptionally good soup. The place is pretty simple and looks like a family operation, but I would recommend it when you are looking for basic soup and sandwich in Downtown Springdale and close to the bike trail.
